Name: Keyboard Warrior: Dreamstate
About the game: Your player is stationary Enemies can't be avoided, only killed. Click enemies to damage them. The faster you click the more damage you deal. Cast powerful specials. Wield a wide variety of special abilities. Discover Clever Ways to Beat the Game With a built-in Speedrunning mode. It works hand-in-hand with the game's core mechanics. Time only ticks when levels are active, and stops once they're completed. Check the Global Leaderbards See how you rank against players all over the world! Important: Before You Buy At the moment, both a mouse and keyboard are required to play. You'll be required to play through the game on normal mode before you can speedrun (to grasp the basics). If you have any serious wrist or forearm problems on your clicking hand, please proceed with caution. Thank you. Have fun.
